item.title: spark_apply: Column must have a unique name
item.description: spark_apply():: Error: Column must have a unique name Did you get excited learning that spark_apply() will let you run your own custom functions in spark? And then, no matter what, you’re getting this joyous error? Column '[column name]' must have a unique name. There’s a few possible causes: You’re using the group_by parameter, and the column name actually isn’t unique. The function you’re running through spark_apply() returns multiple rows/values per input.
